Text:
(Back before I was Delta...back when I was in
a pack...I was really weak.)
(I only got teensy scraps to eat.)

(Pick of the food starts at the top, like all my
brothers and sisters and the females in charge. Pack
rules.)

(Only a little gets left for us weak runts. So, I was
always hungry.)

(Another thing back before I was me...is that I was
always beat up.)

(My bigger, stronger littermate would punch and kick
me, and there was nothing I could do about it. I just
had to sit and take it.)
(But...I'm totally fine with that.)

(That's because the one who was snapping and hurting
us weak guys was stronger than everyone else.)

(Everything the strong do is right. Even if they get
violent or whatever, they're not wrong. Being wrong
is for the weak...)
And if you're weak, you die. Those are the rules.
(So...I got stronger. I hunted to survive.)

(I got stronger and stronger, until no one picked on
 meâ€”)
(And that's when I got "possessed.")

(I got forced out of the pack and was pretty much
dead... That's when I met Boss man.)
(He helped me and made me into Delta.)

(Boss man is the strongest of them all. He's the
strongest in the world. No one could ever beat him.)
(So...there's no way he could die.)
Shadow is dead.
(That's a lie.)

This is the reality of things.
You have to accept it.
(That's a lie.)
(Diablos? Is that demon stealing Boss man's magic?)
(...That's not possible.)

(Boss man could never lose. He'd take Diablos out
in one big kaboom. That's what Boss man does.)
Urk... If you say so, Lady Alpha...
We must uphold Master Shadow's will...right...?

(Lady Alpha is talking nonsense. But then why's
everybody saying the same stuff?)

(Why's Lady Alpha saying Boss man is dead? Why don't
Gamma or Beta or Eta or Epsilon or even that stupid
kitty cat say she's wrong?)
(Crazy... It's crazy! Everybody's crazy!!!)

(It's not right! Why won't anybody say it's not
true?!)
(Why...? Why...?! WHY?!)
It's not true!!! Lady Alpha is a liar!!!
Boss man can't die! Boss man isn't dead!!!

Everybody...all of you are crazy!!! How can you think
Boss man lost?! That's stupid! It's not true! Boss man
can't die!!!

Delta... I know you understand, too. Shadow is dead.
You need to think of what must be done now.
(Think... Think...)

(...No matter how much I try, I can't picture Boss man
losing. Big is big, but that doesn't matter with
Boss man! He can beat anything in one blast!)

(Why doesn't anybody get it? Boss man could never
lose! Lady Alpha and the others are all lying...!)

I mean...Boss man is so strong, and awesome and...
Awoo!
(Wait... I get it now.)

(They don't understand because they're weak. Anything
the strong say is right. And anything the weak say...
is wrong!!!)
Gaaaaaah!!!
Grrrrraaahhh!!!

(So much power... Yeah, I see it now. I'm a lot,
lot stronger.)

(You're weak. They're weak, too. And Lady Alpha...
She's also weak.)

(With this power, I could kill everyone here. I could
probably even take down Boss manâ€”)

(...No, that's not true. I couldn't beat Boss man.
No one could, not even me. Becauseâ€”)
Boss man is the strongest of them all.

Boss man could never lose. The weak just can't
see that.
